articles.description: Rishi Kapoor's uncle Prem Chopra talks about his call to Neetu Kapoor and tears still roll down our eyes at the thought that we will not see Rishi off-screen anymore
articles.content: It's a week gone by. Honestly, it hasn't yet sunk in me that that Rishi Kapoor is no more. In fact, I miss him more with the passing of each day.Image Source:- twitter/RishiKapoorFC1,premch0pra,Avas.mv.com,IBTimes.com
